short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enable accessibility large text for any website!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have a problem with reading small text on the websites? Install the extension and read easily any text on any website. The extension includes:

路 Contrasted text paragraphs only, to not to destroy a website layout 
路 Contrasted cursors
路 Animated links color
路 Clicked links sound
